text: We have begged for same things since 1966 when I was a teenager ~ I am an old woman now w/ Cancer in Texas fighting for access to seed bearing herb #Cannabis God uses to heal #Cancer ~ I am not the only one ~ Tommy Chong, Olivia Newton John, @SharonLetts @WillieNelson & me https://t.co/NmiBCjiCN5 https://t.co/SuwyplhDpa
